name: Mischief vs Couple - Forever Alone
description:
This game is specifically for Forever Alone Guy.

• I’m 30 year old.
• I’m so very handsome, talented and kind…but i have no girlfriend... no first love…
• I’ve been lonely for so long.
• I'm so jealous of happy couples. I always want to see them in trouble. Yes, my favorite.
• I become the guy of mischief, make some fun, Mischief to Couple.

Super funny meme and rage comic graphics. Excellent and Addictive gameplay.
Now, Time to play the game!
